entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Murdochville

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
